table.sql: begin delete xxdr_build_app where appid='113'; insert into xxdr_build_app t ( appid, auth_scheme_prd, auth_scheme_tst, build_datetime, build_number, db_schema, dev_jdbc_url, prd_jdbc_url, release_number, template_appid, tst_jdbc_url) select x.appid, x.auth_scheme_prd, x.auth_scheme_tst, to_date(x.build_datetime,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') as build_datetime, x.build_number, x.db_schema, x.dev_jdbc_url, x.prd_jdbc_url, x.release_number, x.template_appid, x.tst_jdbc_url from xmltable ('/table/tabledata/row' passing xmltype(:1) columns appid varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "appid"]' , auth_scheme_prd varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "auth_scheme_prd"]' , auth_scheme_tst varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "auth_scheme_tst"]' , build_datetime varchar2(200) path 'column[@name eq "build_datetime"]' , build_number number path 'column[@name eq "build_number"]' , db_schema varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "db_schema"]' , dev_jdbc_url varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "dev_jdbc_url"]' , prd_jdbc_url varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "prd_jdbc_url"]' , release_number varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "release_number"]' , template_appid varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "template_appid"]' , tst_jdbc_url varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "tst_jdbc_url"]' ) x; end;
